name: Baked With Love
description:
Welcome to your friendly, local, magical bakery! The sun is shining, there’s the smell of fresh bread in the air, and it’s your very first day of work. Despite your nerves, you’re sure it will be fine.

After all, what’s the worst that can happen? You accidentally poison yourself and end up falling in love with your cute new boss? Haha, don’t be ridiculous.

A game by Sunflower Station: A Wonderful Little Crowd
Entry to the itch.io My First Game Jam, July 2020

Coding and Development
Mimi Chiu, @MimimiCee, https://mimimicee.itch.io/
